name: Befront
title: befront.io
shortDescription: Befront offers a unique approach to learning design by integrating real-life cases into bite-sized practical tasks. Users can enhance their UX/UI skills using the interactive Figma Plugin, which provides instant feedback. Ideal for aspiring designers, Befront helps you master design fundamentals and advanced techniques through weekly practice sessions.
pros: No credit card required for starting
